shortdesc.ph: This error occurs when the connection is interrupted and the SDK cannot reconnect to the server within 10 seconds.

section.p: The SDK triggers this callback when it cannot connect to the server 10 seconds after calling the "joinChannel" method, whether or not it is in the channel. If the SDK fails to rejoin the channel 20 minutes after being disconnected from Agora's edge server, the SDK stops rejoining the channel.
